home.title: Homepage
home.description: BestElectronics is a flexible headless storefront built on Saleor. Quick to deploy, easy to integrate, with an intuitive UI for management and customization.

repairBanner.descriptionMember: Schedule your next repair online — the discount is applied automatically to every registered order.

support.title: Expert support 7 days a week
support.description: Talk to certified specialists whenever you need setup help or urgent diagnostics.

delivery.title: Same-day pick-up and delivery
delivery.description: Couriers collect and return devices on your schedule across the city.

warranty.title: Extended workmanship warranty
warranty.description: Repairs include detailed quality checks plus coverage beyond the standard 90 days.

savings.title: Transparent pricing and loyalty perks
savings.description: Bundle repairs, accessories, and service plans to save up to 25% annually.

support.title: Do it yourself in minutes
support.description: The quickest answers usually live in your account — here are the most helpful shortcuts.

Request a return or warranty check in the order details
Schedule a repair and follow every stage online

visit.title: Visit the service desk
visit.description: Bring devices directly to our service desk for diagnostics or pickup repaired equipment.

meta.title: Order help
meta.description: Checkout, payment and account assistance for BestElectronics orders.

hero.title: Ordering and payments
hero.subtitle: Learn how to build your cart, choose payment methods and keep your account up to date.

selection.title: Cart & availability
selection.description: Everything starts with a balanced cart and a confirmed stock status.
items: Reserve stock for 45 minutes while you browse checkout.
Combine products and services in the same order — the system calculates compatible delivery options automatically.
Need advice? Use the product page chat to message a consultant before adding to cart.

payment.title: Payment methods
payment.description: We support secure local payments and international cards.
items: Bank cards Visa/Mastercard and Elcart are processed via an encrypted gateway.
For cash on delivery, choose courier payment and prepare the exact amount — the courier issues a receipt.
Installments are available for selected partners; look for the "Installment" badge on the product page.

account.title: Account essentials
account.description: Stay signed in to synchronise carts, addresses and service requests.
items: Saved addresses speed up checkout and help us calculate delivery fees instantly.
Order history keeps invoices, return forms and repair updates accessible 24/7.
Enable email notifications in profile settings to receive status alerts immediately.

nextSteps.title: Next steps
nextSteps.description: Ready to continue? Review your basket or jump to delivery details.
items: Check availability and lead times in the cart summary before paying.
Update contact information in profile → personal data to avoid missed calls.
For B2B orders, attach purchase documents in the comments field during checkout.

meta.title: Delivery help
meta.description: Courier, pickup and delivery tracking guidelines.

hero.title: Delivery & pickup
hero.subtitle: Understand how we ship products, arrange pickup and keep you informed along the way.

courier.title: Courier delivery
courier.description: Timely delivery across Bishkek with best-fit time slots.
items: Same-day courier delivery is available for orders confirmed before 14:00.
The courier shares an ETA 30 minutes before arrival.
Large appliances travel with two-person crews; prepare doorway measurements in advance.

pickup.title: Store pickup
pickup.description: Pick up orders from the service desk when it suits you.
items: Pickups are ready within 2 hours once payment is confirmed.
Bring an ID or share the order QR code from your account.
You can inspect and test devices on-site before leaving.

status.title: Status updates
status.description: We keep you in the loop via email, SMS and profile notifications.
items: Delivery status is available in account → orders → tracking.
SMS alerts include the courier name and phone number.
Need to reschedule? Click “change delivery window” inside the order card.

preparation.title: Prepare for delivery
preparation.description: A few minutes of preparation ensure a smooth handover.
items: Clear the pathway for bulky items and protect floors if required.
Have a grounded outlet ready when testing electronics on delivery.
Inspect the package together with the courier and note any damage on the document.

faq.title: Still unsure?
items: Delivery zones and fees for Bishkek and suburbs
What to do if the courier missed the window
Required documents for company pickups

meta.title: Repair help
meta.description: How to submit a repair request, track progress and visit the service centre.

hero.title: Professional repairs with real-time updates
hero.subtitle: Diagnostics, parts ordering and quality control are handled in-house.
hero.description: Use the calculator to estimate costs, hand over the device in person or schedule a courier pickup.

process.title: Repair workflow
process.subtitle: Fast, transparent and aligned with your schedule.
items: Submit a request online or via hotline — we confirm the estimate within one business hour.
Bring the device or arrange pickup. Diagnostics is free for registered customers.
Watch repair stages in your account and receive a notification before delivery.

services.title: What we fix
services.subtitle: Certified engineers handle computers, laptops, monitors and component-level repairs.
items: Component-level motherboard, GPU and PSU repairs
Data recovery and software reinstallations
Express diagnostics for urgent cases

discount.title: Registered customer bonus
discount.description: Log in before submitting a request to activate the built-in 20% labour discount.
items: Free diagnostics and prioritised queue
90-day workmanship warranty on every repair
Stage-by-stage notifications in the customer portal

location.title: Where to find us
location.description: Our service centre is near the intersection of Кулатова and Жукеева-Пудовкина. Parking is available inside the courtyard.

meta.title: Help centre FAQ
meta.description: Short answers to recurring questions about orders, delivery and repair services.

hero.title: Frequently asked questions
hero.subtitle: Quick answers collected by our support engineers.
hero.description: Look up the topic you care about. Each answer links to the relevant section so you can finish the action immediately.

items.question: Can I change the delivery address after payment?
items.answer: Yes. Open the order in your profile and choose “change delivery window”. If the courier has not left the warehouse yet you will be able to pick a new address or pickup point.

items.question: Where do I download invoices and receipts?
items.answer: Invoices and payment receipts live inside Account → Orders. Select the order and use the "Documents" tab. PDF files are generated instantly.

items.question: What should I do if the payment failed?
items.answer: Return to the cart and select “Pay again”. If the bank declined the transaction, try another card or choose cash on delivery. The reserved stock stays with you for 45 minutes.

items.question: How do I track the courier?
items.answer: Open Account → Orders → Tracking. You will see the courier’s name, phone number and live ETA. We also send SMS updates 30 minutes before arrival.

items.question: What documents are needed for pickup?
items.answer: Bring an ID or show the QR code from your order confirmation email. For company pickups, attach a power of attorney or stamped requisites to the order comment.

items.question: Can the courier install appliances?
items.answer: The courier can unpack and perform a basic power-on check. Full installation is available as an extra service — add it in the cart or contact support after placing the order.

items.question: Is diagnostics free of charge?
items.answer: Diagnostics is free for registered customers and for approved warranty repairs. If the device is not repairable we still share the report so you can decide on next steps.

items.question: How long does a typical repair take?
items.answer: Most repairs finish within 2–5 business days. If parts need to be ordered we estimate the lead time during diagnostics and keep you updated in the order timeline.

items.question: How do I extend the 20% repair discount?
items.answer: Stay logged in when submitting repair requests. The discount applies automatically to every task linked with your account, including courier pickup and return delivery.

meta.title: BestElectronics Repair & Service
meta.description: Manage repair offerings and book professional maintenance with BestElectronics. The built-in calculator provides an instant estimate before you speak with a technician.

catalog.title: BestElectronics services

catalog.disclaimer: Final pricing is confirmed after diagnostics. Parts are quoted separately.
